website_summaries.verdict: A versatile option that effortlessly transitions from a backseat organizer to a stroller organizer. Hands down the best value for money.
pros: Generous tablet holder accommodates a 10.1” tablet with a case
An assortment of mesh and zippered pockets accommodate necessities and extras
Universal size fits most car seats and strollers
Consistently earns praise for its sturdy construction
Top and bottom straps hold it securely in place
cons: Some owners felt the lower pockets were a bit difficult to reach, especially in smaller cars

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. Got it yesterday for our 12 hour drive to Canada with 27 month old and 5 month old. I used to shove everything in the seat pocket in front of me and have been thinking about getting something like this for some time. Look at my picture, I can't believe this is what would have been on the floor or in the seat pocket in front of me. It holds baby's bottle of milk, my dunkin donuts coffee, 2 year old's orange juice cup, apple sauce packets, water bottle, baby's sippy cup. What you can't see are the puzzles, notepad, wristlet, snack bars, and so many other things for the car ride!
customer_reviews.author: Kiran

customer_reviews.title: and through all of that it is simply a little bit dirty from all the colored pencil shavings and crayons
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for two years now, with constant use by a 5 to 7 year old. (She was 5 when it was purchased and is now 7) I expect this product to keep on going for several more years. She is not kind to it- she shoves crayons and markers and papers in every pocket, she kicks it, and through all of that it is simply a little bit dirty from all the colored pencil shavings and crayons. I am purchasing another for my boyfriend's new truck to protect his seat backs from her merciless dirty shoes! :)
customer_reviews.author: Qamza

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied so far
customer_reviews.text: Fits most of our baby items very well, pockets seem sturdy and zippers don't feel like they're going to fall apart at any second. The straps fit the seat well and do not leave the organizer looking droopy, it sits snugly against the back of the seat even with a fair amount of baby items inside. I also liked that you couldn't see the straps from the front of the seat when it's on.I was concerned it would be a bother while I was driving, having a plastic clip poking me or catching my hair. But they tuck neatly into the cracks of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, small
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I really like it. It's on the small size (good for stroller). Only complaint the top strap is short it barely fits over the headrest. It only slides down 3/4 of the way. I will need to get an extender. Bought to put the portable DVD player in my husband's truck. F250 Lariat captain chairs so the head rest is a solid piece. So regular DVD holders wouldn't work. Seems to work so far but if I had another 2 inches on top strap it would be perfect! I do like it and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for a cross country road trip. My boys are 6 & 7, everything was in arms reach. Their iPads fit great in the pockets. We stuffed crayons, color books, sunglasses, water bottles, a cookie sheet, toys, markers, car bingo game, card game, magnets and any personal souvenirs they got along the way. I also used the spot between the organizer and the seat as a large pocket. This saved our life. The dual DVD play fit right above it too! The front passengers didn't notice the straps that hold it to the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Practically Perfect in Every Way
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very good quality and the clear zipper pouch is a very generous size to fit my ipad with its giant kid-proof case. The only improvement is to make the pouch a bit taller, as the very top of the ipad screen is cut off by black fabric zipper. If that pouch were just a quarter inch taller, that would be perfect! Until then, this backseat organizer is as close to perfection as you will find.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: The organizer is made very well made and with quality ...
customer_reviews.text: The organizer is made very well made and with quality materials. Right now, it is not possible for my daughter to reach the iPad or anything in the pouches from her Britax forward-facing carseat (as a petite 2.5-yr-old, she's still too young for a booster), no matter how we tried to adjust the passenger seat of our Honda CRV. However, it still helps to get her stuff off of the floor, to keep the car neat, and she enjoys watching a movie or show on the iPad on a long car ride. We look forward to her being able to reach the organizer herself when she gets bigger and is using a booster.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna C. B. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get one before??? Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough good things about this. My child is 6 so we have been through several backseat organizers. This one seems to have everything. 10 inch iPad with huge rugged case slides easily in and out of the holder. Yet easy to pop off to carry all their road trip favs in for the night when stop at hotel. Kiddo is really hard on them. Seriously easy to clean,we got mud on it the first week. I would love to see what happens after the heat of summer on the vinyl/plastic pcs. Sewn really well. I'm excited to use it for next two day drive.
customer_reviews.author: missymdrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit - Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something for our granddaughter to be able to keep her stuff in our car without taking up every nook and cranny in our car. This is PERFECT. I have a Toyota Venza and it fit perfectly on the back of the driver's seat. She now has a place to store all her stuff - hairbrush, sunglasses, mirror, hand sanitizer, etc., etc., etc. I love it and will be recommending it to others. In fact, I found it to be so wonderful, that I purchased 2 more for my daughter's car. That way our 7 year old granddaughter and 3 year grandson can have all their stuff within reach there too.
customer_reviews.author: B. Farrow

customer_reviews.title: Well made, does the job
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made - we use it in the car but it does fit our stroller as well. No problems with the heat melting it or causing sticking issues, the clear pocket has been great for streaming or playing movies on a phone for the kiddo on long trips. Plenty of pockets - a bit small for rounding up stuffed animals or larger board books, but they hold snacks, wipes, diapers etc very well. Quite happy with purchase, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We like this car organizer because it keeps things off the floor and also protects the back of the front seats. I was a little disappointed with the accessibility of some of the pockets - some of them are hard to get to once the organizer is put in the car. It is great quality and is easy to put in the car or on a stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Matheson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I bought it for a long trip that we had in April (GA- CO) for my son to have his tablet and snacks, toys etc. It fits so much stuff and everything is nicely organized. Good material too, nicely made. Def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage possibilities
customer_reviews.text: This holds a lot of misc sized objects. Great storage possibilities. My only complaint is the top attachment doesn't totally fit around my van's oversized seat/headrest, but it still works, just somewhat uncomfortable gettting my hair caught in the buckle from time to time. I would recommend tho!
customer_reviews.author: Pantherina

customer_reviews.title: 5 BIG stars!
customer_reviews.text: This oraganizer is great! It fits the back of the seat perfectly and the straps are in just the right places. It's not so bulky as I was worried that it would be in the way of getting in and out of the car but it's just right. Has plenty of storage pockets to keep everything you need in there and protects the back of the seat too! I recommend this product as it has satisfied my family's needs and I know it will satisfy yours too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Penate

customer_reviews.title: This was one of the best purchases I’ve ever made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thing a few years ago and it’s still holding up strong and is easy to clean. My daughter absolutely LOVES this thing. We often make long drives in the car across state and it’s so convenient to have this for her to put snacks, games, toys, coloring stuff, drinks, AND her tablet. All at once. So she never gets bored.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla moorman

customer_reviews.title: Its just ok. My sons ipad didn't fit too ...
customer_reviews.text: Its just ok. My sons ipad didn't fit too well and even if it did, it covers the top of the screen! If I was relying on it mainly for the ipad it would get 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Well-Made!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after I got a previous brand on here that ripped within days. So far this one seems to be much sturdier, I love that there is a port on the side for ear phones to be plugged in, and that the bottom has a sizable amount of pockets for storage. Easy to install, can make selections through the plastic screen, I can see how older kids might think it's too low but for my 2 year old it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this before going on a long road trip with our 2yo, and it worked great! We were able to turn on a movie when books and toys were no longer entertaining, and kept music going for nap/bedtime. It fits perfectly on the back of the driver's seat, and is at exactly the right height for our little one to see and reach everything needed. Definitely recommend for parents of littles!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Jo Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Travelers
customer_reviews.text: We were so happy to find this product. It ended up saving us money, as we were looking for both a tablet holder for our car and a stroller organizer for our upcoming trip to Disneyland. The product itself is sturdy and works even in the backseat for our rear-facing toddler. It fits his kindle, even with the bulky childproof case. We are very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: mlheywoo

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying a more organized back seat.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love our new giggle sprouts organizers. They like putting their tablets in the pocket to view on the road and the pockets to store their stuff. I like the strong straps and quality materials. The only downside is that sometimes it's hard to activate the touch screen of the tablets through the plastic if you were trying to play a game.
customer_reviews.author: JanH

customer_reviews.title: Holds what needs holding
customer_reviews.text: We did a 2wks, 16 state road trip with a 5yr old. I needed all the comforts of home for this kid. So, i thought a iPad holder would help. But he preferred to have it at his fingertips. So, this help to hold his other stuff. Overall, still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pecina_girl

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 10.1 tablet
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for something to hold your 10.1 tablet this is it. I searched around, bought and returned a couple of products because my tablet would not fit.
customer_reviews.author: JomerP

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Car!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I use it in our car to hold all my kids DVD's toy, drinks, and car stuff. I have not tried it on our Stroller yet but the transition seems simple enough. This has definitely cleaned up my car so my kids things aren't stuffed to the max in the two pockets of my front seats.
customer_reviews.author: Ana T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect seat organizer for the kids
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the kids. The amazon fire tablets fit perfectly and there’s extra room for a larger tablet if needed. Holds little toys and coloring books for when we go on trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is pretty solid. It shipped really fast and is better ...
customer_reviews.text: As universal organizers go, this is pretty solid. It shipped really fast and is better than the pics led me to believe. The only downside was the adjustment to fit the van, but that was because the seats in a Quest are really weird. I'd but this again for sure. The company seems really friendly and down to earth too.
customer_reviews.author: Nevermind

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer/back of seat protector
customer_reviews.text: This is great for all of the kids stuff, easy for them to grab or watch a Kindle or iPad, and keeps them from kicking and dirtying up the back of the adult seats.
customer_reviews.author: MaryKate

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: It’s universal but I didn’t like how it fit on my chair . Was more bulky and didn’t lie flat . Ended up not using it anymore .
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Great organizer! My kids were ecstatic to put it all together with their supplies. Now my car is free of messes. My kids are now excited to take car trips. 😊 Best feature is the IPAD sleeve and the zipper in the left side for headphone jack. I just wish it had a zipper on the right side as well to account for those passengers sitting behind the driver. Since my charging station is in the middle we have a cord draped in front of the organizer vs the side like my other. Despite this, it's still wonderful organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hayden

customer_reviews.title: good organizer for long trips and families on the go
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, easy to install and use, and my 3-year-old loved being able to see all of her toys. Update: we’ve had this for a year and liked it so much we bought a second one! It still looks like new after a year of toddler tantrums and kicking the seats.
customer_reviews.author: ecseteacher

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good product, but could use some improvement. It seems to slouch somewhat and certainly needs the strap on the bottom so that it stays in place. I would have preferred some clips at the top that attach to the bars of the headrest. It would look nicer and would not create bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Doris.

customer_reviews.title: Fits iPad with bulky case
customer_reviews.text: Finally a Backseat organizer that actually fits an iPad with a Lifeproof case!! The touch screen function works well through the plastic. I purchased two of these. We haven't had them long so I can't vouch for durability but they seem like they are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie W

customer_reviews.title: Great car organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is really good! I ordered two to keep all the toys and other items that my granddaughter's bring with them every time we go out. I just love that it has so many pockets. Now everything has a place. No more mess in my car and the kids love it too! The pocket for the tablet is a great addition. Great price, fast shipping and a very nice and well made product. I definitely recommend to anyone that's looking for a car organizer.
customer_reviews.author: m.madriz

customer_reviews.title: Bought this so my toddler wouldn’t mess up the back ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my toddler wouldn’t mess up the back of my seat by continuously kicking it. Having pockets to put his random toys is just an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: B.D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: So many pockets and protects the back of the car ...
customer_reviews.text: So many pockets and protects the back of the car seat so that my toddler doesn't ruin it. It keeps my car tidy, and that was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Good car organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a while. Love that I can store a lot on the car. I might get a second one!
customer_reviews.author: S. V

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but was bummed our iPad didn't fit in ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but was bummed our iPad didn't fit in it. It's my husbands work iPad so I wasn't familiar with it at all. We will eventually get one that fits but the cup holders and storage on it is very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Lots of pockets to organize the kids' stuff. I surprised my 6 year old and he really likes it. Electronic device holder works great and does not decrease the touch functionality. I also like that I can attach it to the stroller for my 4month old.
customer_reviews.author: WonderWoman24

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product...haven't used the organizational capacity yet but as for a kick mat...works well.. My son has an Ipad 1st generation and with the Otterbox it is extremely snug...not sure if his Samsung Pro 12.2 will fit but we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: ... vehicle to place the iPad into and it works perfect! I opened my Amazon box and thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Nissan Versa vehicle to place the iPad into and it works perfect! I opened my Amazon box and thought it was huge for the Versa but it fits perfectly and it was a lifesaver during a 7 hour road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Mae2

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful for road trips!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is great. I bought it for our first big road trip with my 3 and 1 year old and my 3 year old loves that she can easily access many of her toys (all by herself) or watch the Kindle for longer trips! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: HeatherM147

customer_reviews.title: Great organizing tool!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great tool to keep our backseat organized. It holds plenty of stuff and has a good variety of pockets. It came in most handy on a recent roadtrip as it has the space for a tablet. My toddler son could watch a show on the drive and it was easy for me to reach back and hand him anything he needed from the organizer. This was definitely a worthwhile purchase for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: This Mommy is Happy
customer_reviews.text: Love this organizer! The pad holder is perfect! Unzips along side for easy access to plug in headphones, actually registers touch through the protective plastic, and is large enough to hold pad with bulky case. Tons of pockets for drinks, toys, wipes, etc.. Excellent quality! Would highly recommend. I have 2😊
customer_reviews.author: Jerilyn Chevallier

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this. It fits the back of the seat well. It holds so many different things. I ruined a previous cars interior from the kids leaving crayons, markers, etcetera on the seats. Noe there's a place to put it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Potts

customer_reviews.title: Great kids car organizer
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, was good quality and easy install, helps keep my backseat organized- places for toys, shoes, water cup, etc. great if you have kids!
customer_reviews.author: K. E.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend for her baby shower. I bought cups, books, toys and wipes and filled it to the brim. It held alot and it seems to be very well made. I already have a toddler and we have an organizer that sits next to her because she kicks the back of the seat right now, but I think I will buy one of these for myself once she gets out of that stage!
customer_reviews.author: cshimer310

customer_reviews.title: Not just for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. It will hold her kindle, iPod, drinks, and a ton of extras all in one convenient place for travel and easy accessibility on trips. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: suquestions

customer_reviews.title: The pockets are very room and great for holding cup The tablet holder fits my kindle ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits the passenger seat of my 2002 explorer well. The pockets are very room and great for holding cup The tablet holder fits my kindle fire 8 HD even with the child protection cover.
customer_reviews.author: mdhenke

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like this enough to buy again. Its great to put on the front of the seat where my toddler is facing backwards, that way she can watch the iPad on long road trips. Now I am buying more for the rest of the seats.
customer_reviews.author: Katie KatzTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: We picked this up for travel and actually mounted it on the back of an airplane seat on a longish plane ride, to keep our toddler entertained. It works just as well in our car! This product is vastly superior in quality to other similar products that we've owned. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: The Reuvenator

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for trip but then it stretched out & hardly holds things within 3 months of purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful invention!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I am a 56yr old woman, who uses this for all of my electronics . We travel allot r.ving. I have my iPad Air, iPhone, kindle and all the cords and chargers in it plus my drink! It works absolutely wonderful! And you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbie Beavers Moore

customer_reviews.title: Happy kids, happy mom
customer_reviews.text: Before we discovered this organizer, my two kids would spend an entire road trip on a phone. Or they'd ask me to end an argument over who gets the coloring book. Now, they each have their own coloring books, trivia games, a deck of cards, tissues, and drinks at an arm's reach. The floor of the back seat stays clean, and we don't misplace things so easily. They're grateful for the autonomy and cleanliness. Yay for organizing. Can you please make more of these for the front seat and my purse?
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: WooHoo! An organizer that doesn't sag!
customer_reviews.text: I've previously purchased similar items to help us entertain our kiddo for long trips. I finally found one that doesn't sag and can hold the ipad in place for him to watch. Surprisingly, we can hear the music from the iPad videos very well as it plays, while in the organizer :-)
customer_reviews.author: Suhaily Soto

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping kids nick knacks and tablet for movies. Also protects seat from kids kicking their feet in it.
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: somewhat helpful Straps not useful so item flips around Sits low on back of ...
customer_reviews.text: Eh... somewhat helpful Straps not useful so item flips around Sits low on back of seat, most useful on stroller
customer_reviews.author: GoddessTM

customer_reviews.title: Decent Organizer, but mine was flawed...
customer_reviews.text: Cute organizer, plenty of pockets. It appears to be made well. I started loading it up when I noticed that the zipper for the "Spacious, Zippered Hidden Pocket" didn't actually open a pocket. It was just a zipper that goes back and forth. Otherwise I would've given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: and I love this product so well I bought four
customer_reviews.text: I have two young grandchildren, and I love this product so well I bought four. (Two for my vehicle and two as a gift for my son.) They work great not only for children, but adults in the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: mcas

customer_reviews.title: I love the storage space
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two for our GMC Acadia. I love the storage space, the protection from little feet, and the tablet pocket. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a long road trip and my son absolutely loved it. It held a lot of his stuff and was great for snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica25560

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for road trip
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well for our road trip. The only con was that the bottom pocket hung too low for them to use. They did use the top pockets and iPad pocket.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: nice quality great fit on suv seat
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what i was looking for. It fits my honda Pilot nicely and has many pocket to keep my kids stuff organized during daily trips. I will probably buy another for my other seat.
customer_reviews.author: K.pamela

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 9 hour road trip and was well worth it! Great organizer. Fits a lot of items. Easy to install. Only issue is that in a small car it is hard for a child in a car seat to actually see the iPad due to the passenger seat being so close.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hairston

customer_reviews.title: Great organization
customer_reviews.text: It seems like the plastic is too reflective, hopefully my tinted windows help to view a digital device through it
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne R Boltersdorf

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this!!!!! So far this is the best seat organizer I have ever found. I always need items on the go with my daughter and this is a life saver along with being sturdy its worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Fits over my Toyota Sienna seats with ease
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Fits over my Toyota Sienna seats with ease. Holds a lot of kids stuff and is easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi B.

customer_reviews.title: i like this ok
customer_reviews.text: i like this ok, i don't use it as often as i hoped, but it does help to keep my car organized and cleaner than it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product however top zipper separated before I even used it
customer_reviews.author: NLizak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: was able to organize everything extremely well! doesnt sag in my car. I have a nissan rogue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! But needs bigger tablet pouch.
customer_reviews.text: The organizer was great for our recent trip! The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the clear pouch for a tablet was not big enough to fit a Surface Pro 3. It's probably my fault for not measuring correctly, and other than that, it was fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Holds my surface pro and my children's ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Holds my surface pro and my children's tablets. Fits in my 2010 nissan Altima with no problems. Holds my kids items with ease. Wish I would have known about this along time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Larson

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and number of pockets
customer_reviews.text: The number of pockets is just right for stashing a water bottle, some snacks, and a handful of small toys. Importantly, there aren't too many pockets that things get lost, and that there aren't too many deep pockets for rubbish to build up. The organizer was easy to strap onto the passenger seat of our car (2008 Prius).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My son can reach his toys and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My son can reach his toys and there is no more messy backseat because everything has its place
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your search for a backseat organizer is over!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best backseat organizer! Cup holders are actually big enough to hold sippy cups, it's firm and doesn't flop over, the top clear pocket works great for books and handy for an iPad. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Keeps him happily entertained while we drive
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this!! It shows him all his toys and he loves using the pockets. Keeps him happily entertained while we drive!
customer_reviews.author: SpectrumMooose

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! These are a fantastic idea for trips or day to day with kids. Plenty of pockets and room. I ordered multiples.
customer_reviews.author: Pbjmama

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I love the storage and durability. I was worried about durability but it's a quality product. It looks just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: 'Drea

customer_reviews.title: She will be traveling back and forth and I thought this would be a great place for her to put all her travel things
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old granddaughter that is moving 8 hours away from me. She will be traveling back and forth and I thought this would be a great place for her to put all her travel things. It fits everything wonderfully! I recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Alderson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR CAR TRAVEL
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizer. I bought it for our trips around town this Summer to keep my 4 year old entertained. Well made, perfect for ipad, great pocket configuration. Easy to attach.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystalle Holz

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Placement of tablet pocket slightly too low.
customer_reviews.text: The organizer works well as advertised however the location of pocket for the tablet seems low when placed onto the back of my driver's seat. Still useful for storing kid supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Evowindo

customer_reviews.title: Will recommend. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Used this recently on our trip. Planning to purchase another one! Material is not cheap. Can hold a lot of stuff. Will recommend. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: crystalclear

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it advertises. It hold everything for a toddler and holds a small portable DVD player very well. I'd highly recommend it for use in a 2013 Honda Pilot.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gates

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and well made. I actually think it save my life. It is a great organizer specially when you have kids!

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the car and stroller! It holds everything I need for my little one. Love that I can fit the IPAD in and not have to worry about the screen getting scratched!

customer_reviews.title: Car Organizer is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, strong, good quality material, fits well in both cars, keeps our back seat organized and keeps our 2 year old happy. Also Giggle Sprouts has terrific follow up from customer service! They obviously know how to keep their customers happy!

customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I bought this about a month ago so my toddler can watch movies in the car. It fits the seat great and the opening is perfect for a 10.1 inch tablet! I highly recommend this!

customer_reviews.text: I love this! It's so useful! It's sturdy! My girls love it! It looks good in my SUV. I have an 8 year old and a 2 year old.

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy the organization it provides in my car
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely product. I really enjoy the organization it provides in my car. My only issue is that my daughter is still in the toddler setting for her car seat so she needs to be pushed closer to my seat so she can reach her things. This will be remedied add soon as she graduates to the booster setting and has more room to sit forward

product_meta.title: Giggle Sprouts Universal Backseat Car Organizer
feature_bullets: KEEPS BACKSEAT CLEAR OF CLUTTER: Tame that kid chaos quickly! This car back seat organizer has 8 mesh & zippered pockets for your children's gear (more than others). Keeps essentials off the floor & seat.
WATCH VIDEOS ON THE GO: Features iPad and Tablet holder (won't distort screen) with full touchscreen access for your toddler. Fits most tablets up to 10.1", portable DVD player, or coloring books!
DOUBLES AS STROLLER ORGANIZER: Take this buggy organizer with you; it clips quickly to any stroller to hold kids' snacks and toys as well as your phone, wallet, keys, and water bottle.
RUGGED FOR EVERYDAY LIFE: Constructed of eco-friendly, water-resistant 600D polyester that can handle wear and tear. This baby car caddy installs easily on headrest with extra-long, adjustable strap.

100% RISK FREE Lifetime Satisfaction Guarantee: Whether you buy one for yourself or as a birthday, baby shower or holiday gift, our organizer tote is backed by an unbeatable 100% money-back guarantee.

specifications.Material Type: BPA Free, Phthalate Free, Latex Free, Lead Free
specifications.Best uses: Perfect for road trips, family vacations, and everyday use to organize and tidy. Also converts into a handlebar stroller organizer for stroller walks and park treks.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars309 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
